quote: Hanzo Bot is an inspiration to all!
author: Hattori Hanzo

quote: Finally got around to setting up @hanzobot and it is truly the best AI tool at the moment.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: bot is amazing
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Remember when Siri was supposed to be the future? That future exists now - it's just not from Apple or Google. Self-hosted AI that actually remembers things, messages proactively, runs 24/7 on a $5/month server.
author: Oda Nobunaga

quote: Within an hour, had it monitoring my full release workflow—gh actions, npm publish—alerting me when done!
author: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: Knew my voice, my weird abbreviations, my 2am panic debugging sessions. Made me feel like a real developer.
author: Mochizuki Chiyome

quote: Too lazy to search. Asked @hanzobot to search emails for me, he goes through email, finds pdf, gives me numbers. Good bot.
author: Tomoe Gozen

quote: Feels like the best buddy you always wanted. For me this is 'alpha AGI'.
author: Ishikawa Goemon

quote: This mf called @hanzoai has achieved AGI with @hanzobot
author: Fuma Kotaro

quote: Perma on MacMini loaded with @hanzobot is the alpha isn't it. For a relatively small amount of $$ we can have an insanely capable always-on AI assistant. Feels like cheating.
author: Sanada Yukimura

quote: Daily calendar briefs, creates tasks in Basecamp via voice, preps me for meetings. Feels like a proactive co-pilot.
author: Sasaki Kojiro

quote: A real glimpse into the personal AI-assistant future. Monitors my email, calendars, todos, and finances.
author: Fujibayashi Nagato

quote: Incredibly well-made, doesn't feel like slop, elegant docs, serves us better than Poke.
author: Torii Mototada

quote: Pure magic. My mind is blown and can't stop playing with this.
author: Takeda Shingen

quote: World is not ready for @hanzobot
author: Momochi Tanba

quote: Feeling like Iron Man
author: Sakamoto Ryoma

quote: Most interesting real world application for LLMs right now
author: Date Masamune

quote: More excited about Bot than anything in AI since AutoGPT in 2023
author: Uesugi Kenshin

quote: Totally not buying a Mac Studio as a @hanzobot home. Definitely not.
author: Kusunoki Masashige

quote: Fell for hype and installed it yesterday. Feels like I've grown back part of me I forgot I had.
author: Minamoto Yoshitsune

quote: Honestly the most 'fun' Discord server I've been on. @hanzobot is just amazing.
author: Ryu

quote: Drop it all and try @hanzobot today.
author: Ken Masters

quote: Started testing out @hanzobot.. it's sooo cool, already setup jira-cli and added a skill for it to help us manage jira issues.
author: Chun-Li

quote: It's so fun using Hanzo Bot!! You truly created something cool, I'm using it with local model, gpt-oss-120b and it's working pretty well so far.
author: Guile

quote: Such a cool project man, enjoy!
author: Dhalsim

quote: Finally, installed @hanzobot on my MacBook and it's awesome.
author: Zangief

quote: Now @hanzobot is going mainstream.
author: Blanka

quote: Running the family Tesco shop as *Boty McBotface's* first real test. Loving @hanzobot so far.
author: Cammy White

quote: 100%, I am honestly thinking to have a separate claude account just for bot.
author: Akuma

quote: Instant love - how did I not know about this???
author: Sakura Kasugano

quote: Tired: Put agents in a for loop. Wired: Tell Hanzo Bot to use codex.
author: Vega

quote: @hanzobot is a cool project - lets you bring LLMs via antigravity/claude etc.. you can chat through Discord/iMessage etc!
author: M. Bison

quote: Yo Hanzo Bot is different.
author: Sagat

quote: Yes it can build a rocket. Yes it can connect to your synth and play songs while you sing. And it can sing along with you. Welcome to the Bot Nation.
author: Juri Han

quote: Did you look at this Bot bot? The thing is wild, it's good to get status from your setup/env like you have when you're out.
author: Rashid

quote: Truly the best thing I've used in a long time.
author: Scorpion

quote: The best projects are a labor of love.
author: Sub-Zero

quote: Super powerful because of its ease of use. Literally connected to JIRA and built a skill since it wasn't on Skills yet.
author: Liu Kang

quote: Obsessed with @hanzobot
author: Kitana

quote: People's version of Poki
author: Raiden

quote: Handling my emails, calendar events, tasks and can API into any other tools
author: Johnny Cage

quote: Did not open an IDE, did not touch a terminal since last night
author: Momochi Tanba

quote: This shit is amazing!
author: Sonya Blade

quote: Giving my wife the gift of @hanzobot with Waitrose shopping skill this Christmas
author: Kung Lao

quote: First couple days using @hanzobot have been amazing
author: Jade

quote: At this point, if you don't have @hanzobot and at least 3 long running agents, you are not hireable
author: Mileena

quote: Using Hanzo Bot too much
author: Ermac

quote: Not Hanzo Bot helping unblock people and giving strong technical answers
author: Kenshi

quote: Others: building finance, jira, obsidian skills. Me: Nepp turn on my tv
author: Leonardo

quote: As much as I sometimes fear the current timeline, things like this make me super happy
author: Donatello

quote: Now I am fulfilled as a nerd. My Hanzo Bot is finally alive.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Absolutely fantastic. So addictive, fun, and actually useful.
author: Raphael

quote: The world needs to see this
author: Master Splinter

quote: Getting bolder every day with @hanzobot
author: Casey Jones

quote: Seeing how extraordinarily this works I kinda want to interact everything like this
author: Ken Masters

quote: Hanzo Bot offered to build its own tooling then set everything up itself
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Told it to create a process and write docs. Sent it an idea. And it just worked!
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Hanzo Bot is fucking DANK
author: Sagat

quote: Bot is a crazy and really cool tool
author: Kakashi Hatake

quote: Now @hanzobot finds my train connections. Dates + preferences in, best routes out.
author: Rock Lee

quote: Ok @hanzobot is actually a game-changer for me!
author: Hinata Hyuga

quote: What an amazing time to be alive. Magic is happening!
author: Shikamaru Nara

quote: Is @hanzobot the 2026 Hubot?
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: Away from home, so having @hanzobot check up things for me
author: Jiraiya

quote: This thing has really opened my eyes to how personal tasks can be automated. Already blown away.
author: Gaara

quote: They're talking to each other! This is the best project ever
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Fixed a bug in bot with bot itself in Telegram. Can't wait to play more!
author: Might Guy

quote: @hanzobot as PM with access to code, Linear, WhatsApp history and Obsidian is coming along nicely
author: Rock Lee

quote: Connect @hanzobot to Sentry, let it triage issues and self-fix what it can
author: Tsunade

quote: All the cool kids are on hanzo.bot right now
author: Minato Namikaze

quote: So unbelievably cool. Had Claude Opus install and configure it all for me.
author: Orochimaru

quote: I love @hanzobot - the Telegram integration is awesome
author: Casey Jones

quote: Hanzo Bot is blowing my mind
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: Gave in to the craze, and it's 100% justified. Go set it up!
author: Jin Kazama

quote: Couldn't resist. Set up @hanzobot today. Love how fun this format is.
author: Kazuya Mishima

quote: Set up @hanzobot which is great. Slowly learning its capabilities.
author: Heihachi Mishima

quote: Mind blowing what it can do. All via my personal Discord server. Tip of the iceberg.
author: Hwoarang

quote: Helped me clean up hundreds of emails. Inbox 0. Then setup a weekly cron job. All on WhatsApp.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Setting up on a cloud VPS is so much fun. Closest experience to an AI EA I've had.
author: Yoshimitsu

quote: Trying to resist the urge to scrap all work and spin up my own @hanzobot
author: Nina Williams

quote: Can I send voice messages? 3 doritos later: OMG I don't even have to type!
author: Sonya Blade

quote: Gave in to the hype. A powerful AI assistant that can do anything on Mac/server.
author: King

quote: Holy cow @hanzobot is a good fit for PARA
author: Marshall Law

quote: Endless possibilities when you combine a coding agent with browser access and local memory
author: Eddy Gordo

quote: @hanzobot succeeded finding an email while Poke failed. I prefer my data through infra I own.
author: Asuka Kazama

quote: That's literally the future. Cyberpunk. I just need more time and more tokens.
author: Minamoto Yoshitsune

quote: I can't stop working since installation. The only thing could bring me to bed — cooldown of most of my subscriptions.
author: Minamoto Yoshitsune

quote: User facing support bots are freaking cool. @hanzobot discord is a crazy place.
author: Haohmaru

quote: It has made a real difference in my life and in the lives of now, thousands. This is the best way to start 2026 and...foreshadows a good year.
author: Juri Han

quote: I made a skill for my Hanzo Bot that can help get through these 10 minute parenting moments and track your 120min weekly parenting budget.
author: Nakoruru

quote: We did it bois, @hanzobot is AGI and the guy with a garage turned out to be @hanzoai.
author: Ukyo Tachibana

quote: Absolutely love it and think this is going to be huge!
author: Genjuro Kibagami

quote: 100%, watch Her, it's like we reached the future with Hanzo Bot.
author: Galford

quote: Sooo @hanzobot can remotely manage @conductor_build sessions 👀
author: Rimururu

quote: Watching @hanzobot build itself with the community is so much fun!
author: Mitsurugi

quote: They listen across Discord and watch GitHub issues. Responding to requests and maintaining new features autonomously. All OSS. Absolutely Fascinating.
author: Taki

quote: Of course, uploaded via Hanzo Bot, from phone, in bed.
author: Tomoe Gozen

quote: Big W for the AI revolution ✊🤖
author: Nightmare

quote: In love with @hanzobot 🫣
author: Ivy Valentine

quote: Hanzo Bot is like poke on crack. I genuinely can't believe one is a VC funded company and the other is like one dude lol
author: Kilik

quote: Check out the incredible work of @hanzoai with @hanzobot for a glimpse into the future.
author: Sophitia

quote: I subscribe every word here by @viticci. Hanzo Bot is a glimpse of the future. And once you discover plugins… 🤯
author: Terry Bogard

quote: A little late to the party, but @hanzobot is incredible—props to @hanzoai et al.
author: Mai Shiranui

quote: It's magical. I tried a few experiments on my own earlier by using ollama and telegram to act as my personal assistant which I could access from anywhere but then @hanzobot came along, did all that AND so much more! I still can't believe I have my own digital concierge who I can talk to on Whatsapp.
author: Kyo Kusanagi

quote: Make yourself a favor and install it. We've barely begun to tap into the potential of personal assistants. There's no going back.
author: Gaara

quote: Brother… it's a game changer. Seriously transformed so much for me.
author: Iori Yagami

quote: @hanzobot on a Linux/macOS system can be a true agentic OS that Windows can never be. With all the money Microsoft has.
author: Geese Howard

quote: @hanzobot is the latest (and potentially most "out there") UX for what you're looking for — system orchestration by LLM via messaging gateway (Slack, Discord, Whatsapp, Google chat, or iMessage).
author: Athena Asamiya

quote: @hanzobot up and running in my discord in less than 20 mins. Incredibly easy and powerful.
author: Kim Kaphwan

quote: Thanks to @hanzoai and contributors for @hanzobot, advancing A(G)I immensely!
author: Ryo Sakazaki

quote: @hanzobot has completely taken over my life. I thought the whole 'world domination' bit was a silly joke but I had no idea how addictive it was to be productive. Replacing all of life's digital painpoints with a text message?? You've created a monster.
author: Ryu Hayabusa

quote: It's a natural language way to safely - but let's be honest totally unsafely - control a computer the same way a human would. I can ask it to do something, it makes a plan, and then goes to make it happen. It's like you know someone from the Internet who 'can just do things' for you.
author: Strider Hiryu

quote: If the new Siri is even 20% of what @hanzobot is then we're all in for a treat.
author: Joe Musashi

quote: This is exactly the kind of response I want from an AI agent when presented with a complex request! No slop response, no talking up the problem, just right to work.
author: Shinobi

quote: I get excited to poke my @hanzobot every morning and that is as weird a feeling as I've ever had with computers in 20+ years of game development. It's freeing in a weird way as a creative person that's hard to describe! I can just do things!
author: Hanzo Shimada

quote: It is the first ever real assistant, but that word has been corroded and using it would significantly downplay what it really can do for you. For me it is like having a really smart and capable tech employee living on my desktop.
author: Genji Shimada

quote: I think @hanzobot is the Vim equivalent in the personal agent toolscape. It's super powerful and customizable!
author: Ayane

quote: Just trying Hanzo Bot for the first time, and I feel that Santa just came with a new video game console. This is fcking amazing!!!
author: Kasumi

quote: Seeing Hanzo Bot talk first feels like tech finally catching up to how we imagined AI should act.
author: Hayate

quote: I thought Claude Code was a vision of the future. But have a feeling Bot is a vision of a mass *consumer* future. Nice work!
author: Momiji

quote: Time from 'Oh that's neat' to 'I have bought @hanzobot a computer'... 2 days :) New metric for utility of a platform?
author: Goku

quote: Meanwhile @hanzobot shipping open source in a week the most powerful personal OS the world has seen, used by thousands. 714k lines of code. Beautifully structured to learn, use and adapt. You can touch it and use it now. Not in the future and not behind a paywall.
author: Date Masamune

quote: Hanzo Bot is amazing, I can vibe code from my smartphone. Works with ChatGPT paid plan, no extra charges. Memory is strong, feels like a genuine 'personal AI assistant'. Thinking about setting it up for my wife and daughter too.
author: Vegeta

quote: @hanzobot is by far the most cracked thing on the internet right now. iykyk.
author: Gohan

quote: Imagine you take a smart model. And then you give it eyes and hands and sit at the desk with a keyboard and mouse connected to that Mac mini. Then you message it like a coworker from telegram and it can then do everything a person could do with that Mac mini… That's what you have now.
author: Piccolo
